entry.string: Every block instance requires a unique name
entry.translation: Efery bluck instunce-a reqooures a uneeqooe-a neme

entry.string: The title of the block as you want it to appear on your website
entry.translation: Zee teetle-a ooff zee bluck es yuoo vunt it tu eppeer oon yuoor vebseete

entry.string: The type of block that you wish to add.
entry.translation: Zee type-a ooff bluck thet yuoo veesh tu edd. Bork bork bork!

entry.string: This field is optional. This is a specific override template that you want to use for this block.
entry.translation: Thees feeeld is oopshunel. Thees is a speceeffic ooferreede-a templete-a thet yuoo vunt tu use-a fur thees bluck.

entry.string: Initial block group to place this block into (optional)
entry.translation: Ineetiel bluck gruoop tu plece-a thees bluck intu (oopshunel)

entry.string: This field is used to determine whether the block is shown (maximized) or hidden.
entry.translation: Thees feeeld is used tu determeene-a vhezeer zee bluck is shoon (mexeemized) oor heeddee.
